name: GeoActive Group on GitHub
body:
[GeoActive Group](http://www.geoactivegroup.com) is a professional services company that specializes in market development. Offering a unique blended methodology of strategic wisdom and tactical street smarts, we enable you to convert our empirical research-based guidance into measurable results.

Read Our Story, to learn more about what we can do for you. We'll study your business environment, assess the options and make recommendations that fit your need to evolve.

We're monitoring the global networked economy, on the lookout for market shifts and changes that create a window of opportunity for our customers. See for yourself.

Our [Digital Lifescapes](http://blog.geoactivegroup.com), [Business Technology Roundtable](http://btr.geoactivegroup.com) and [Transmedia Newswire](http://newswire.geoactivegroup.com) sites provides daily news and commentary on the latest Technology, Media and Telecom market research from the leading global industry analysts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
